EmailTemplate.description: Email sent to HOC participants for feedback and presentations
EmailTemplate.name: 2017 HOC Invitations GL.2017 HOC Presentations and Survey Email
EmailTemplate.subject: Thank you for attending the Honeywell Helicopter Operators Conference
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/]]>
The Honeywell Customer and Product Support Team would like your feedback on the 2017 Honeywell Helicopter Operators Conference. Even if you chose to not attend this year, your input will help to design beneficial conferences in the future. You will find the survey here <[[https://www.surveymonkey.com/r/HOC2017]]>.
In addition, the presentation materials <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/rs/641-QIX-912/images/HOC_2017_Briefings.zip]]> and channel partner directories <[[https://myaerospace.honeywell.com/contact-us/helicopter-sales-and-services]]> are now available to download.
The Honeywell Helicopter Operators Conference would not be possible without the support of our channel partners. A special thank you to our sponsors, M International, Diagnostic Solutions International (DSI), Air Parts and Supply Company (APSCO), Prime Turbines, MASCO, Intermountain Turbine Services and NorcaTec LLC for making this event possible.
Thank you for attending the Honeywell Helicopter Operators Conference and if you need additional information, please contact your Honeywell Customer Support Program Manager or Deta Adams, HOC Coordinator at deta.adams@honeywell.com <[[mailto:deta.adams@honeywell.com]]>.
Sign up for the Helicopter Newsletter here. <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/newsletter]]>
